channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3961] IF-15 Search Order - exception during cache set
item.description:
I got this exception in the console when loading the order history page.

[SapOrderService] Some unknown exception occured while putting object into cache for SearchOrder null

This exception is caused by the com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.inout.erp.impl.OrderSearchRequestCacheKey class, because some lines are not null safe.
item.summary: IF-15 Search Order - exception during cache set

comments.comment:
It seems an SAP error, since from SAP we got the follwing soap response (request is attached):

<SOAP:Envelope xmlns:SOAP="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
<SOAP:Header/>
<SOAP:Body>
<SOAP:Fault>
<faultcode>SOAP:Server</faultcode>
<faultstring>Server Error</faultstring>
<detail>
<ns1:FaultMessage xmlns:ns1="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris">
<faultId/>
<faultName/>
<faultText/>
</ns1:FaultMessage>
</detail>
</SOAP:Fault>
</SOAP:Body>
</SOAP:Envelope>

Hello Maciej,
Could you please investigate this one?
Seems to be fixed & closed, am I right Francesco?

The correct jira issue for the soap request and soap fault i've attached is DISTRELEC-3962.
Anyway, the problems seems to be solved now.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3921] IF-11 - price issue
item.description:
Hi Ligia
could you please check the behaviour of IF-11 order calculation when a simulation is performed?

I've tested together with Evangelos that the prices for the product are not calculated correctly(see screenshoot).

I've tested with product: 14352202
item.summary: IF-11 - price issue

comments.comment:
Hi Francesco,

I investigated the issue and I think it is corrected now. Please test again in Q01 and let me know your test result.

Best Regards,
Ligia
Has this been resolved?

In my knowledge this has been fixed. We are missing the freight information from the Webshop side and hence the totals maybe not be correct at the moment.
Francesco any news?

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3773] Order code definition for ELFA
item.description:
The master system of the order code is SAP.

The order code is created with IF-11 Order Calculation interface
Since the order creation is asynchronous (business process) the webshop doesn't know the order code until SAP has generated it.

In the order confirmation page the webshop should show the SAP Order Code.

So, when the user will place an order, a loading icon will be shown until the sap order code is set on the hybris order.

In that way the place order process remains asynchronous, but from the user point of view the process will appear synchronous.

In hybris order the field erpOrderCode will contain the SAP code when it will be generated.
item.summary: Order code definition for ELFA

comments.comment:
Please estimate the effort for this implementation asap.
Thx.

From the backend point of view the implementation is done.
What is missing is the frontend part.
Please implement a service to make sure we got the order number from SAP and set a flag in that case the front end knows if the order has been created.

The service is available by invoking an url like this one:

/checkout/orderConfirmation/checkErpCode?code=ORDER_CODE

Please remember that this service must be invoked with an authenticated customer.

If the ERP Code is present then the response will be something like:

"{"status":"ok","erpCode":"ERP_ORDER_CODE"}"

otherwise, if the erp code is still missing:

"{"status":"waiting","erpCode":""}"

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3426] Wrong display on detail page
item.description:
OS: Windows 7 Enterprise
Browser: IE 8.0.7601.17514
URL: http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komparator-4x-TSSOP-14-VE%3D2500Stk--ST-TS3704IPT/p/11027744?q=*&filter_Category3=Analoge+Schaltungen&filter_Buyable=1&filter_Versorgungsspannung=2.7%3F16+V&filter_Price=1047+-+1562&page=3&origPageSize=10&simi=100.0

Wrong display of attribute names in technical information. (img_501_pzu)
item.summary: Wrong display on detail page

comments.comment: Hallo Patrick, soll es links eingerückt sein oder nur einzeilig mit ... gekürzt werden?
Fixed and checked in to the SVN in the ELFA branch (2.0)
Erik to check how to move to R1.1

Tested, core issue fixed, follow-up bug in separate ticket: DISTRELEC-3941
closing this one.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-393] Codelists
item.description:
check all codelists https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/ERP+Codelists

  • are they complete?
  • do we need translations (visible to end user)?
item.summary: Codelists

comments.comment: Adi, please check with Pascal / Nando. We need to know this week what is still missing.

Codelists used for Movex scope are complete (end-to-end testing ongoing DISTRELEC-1827).
Set new due date to check codelists for ELFA/NewSAP scope.

Translation are covered by DISTRELEC-2555. Responsibility at Distrelec.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3970] missing shipping and delivery cost in cart
item.description: the shipping and payment cost are not shown even if SAP provides the values in IF-11.
item.summary: missing shipping and delivery cost in cart

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3948] IF-01 - unhandled units in the webshop
item.description:
These are some units that SAP send us, but at the moment these units are not defined in the webshop

  • PAC
  • P
  • CM2
  • MM
  • CCM

When we import the erp_product files, the products defined with these units will have a missing unit in hybris.
This is causing a problem when importing the erp_price (IF-02)

These the possible solutions:

  • add a default unit (eg: PC) instead these units (attached there is a groovy script to modify in hybris the product with missing unit)
  • add these units in hybris in addition to the current unit codelist.
item.summary: IF-01 - unhandled units in the webshop

comments.comment: Missing units added to hybris.
Please check whether import is now working.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3945] Double Opt-In link // 500 error
item.description:
When I clicked on the double opt-in link in the mail for user "distrelec.testing+lt.b2c@gmail.com" I received a 500 error. Cache was cleaned bevorehand. I just created the user some minutes bevore clicking the link so it should have been valid.

Nevertheless the user was Activated(verified@HMC) and the login afterwards worked.

Double-Opt-in-Link: https://test.a.distrelec.lt/register/doubleoptin/activation?token=wIj6bHXA157RepLHIBSmdmCppyF2QThVLtYR3FUmKZm2PF0OvWDVpI%2BZ101oYy8lxxQNB%2FQ8WJOeTM740nCawn5ZCv3Wpa8eiNTOoilwmqaJReP5Wxq0fIsCK10Jupr99N1UfIJLolXifXcwrMBW4kGd6Gj4AKsP9emKOh2p4f4%3D

Time: 22:25
Node: env-q00,
unknown
item.summary: Double Opt-In link // 500 error

comments.comment: Problem fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3916] LT: Remove from shopping list not working if more than 1 item in list
item.description:
atos q
https://test.a.distrelec.lt

  • log in, e.g. as nando.mueller+lt1@gmail.com / distrelec
  • find two products, add them to the same shopping list
  • open the shopping list, remove one of the items

Result

  • number count next to list updates correctly
  • "-1" badge appears
  • but the item is not removed from the list
  • it only disappears after a refresh
item.summary: LT: Remove from shopping list not working if more than 1 item in list

comments.comment:
Fixed.
We had only removed the product if the product was the last of the list...

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3910] LT - Delete all products in cart ends in an 500 error
item.description:
Windows 7 Enterprise
IE 9.0.8112.16421

Add som products to the cart, go to cart, remove all products while use the remove function. After remove of the last product an 500 error page opens. (img_7/8_pzu_lt)
item.summary: LT - Delete all products in cart ends in an 500 error

comments.comment:
Hello Francesco,

As discussed, you will find below the stacktrace and the spring configuration :

Bean configuration : /distrelecerpabstractionlayer/resources/distrelecerpabstractionlayer-spring.xml

	
<alias alias="findDeliveryCostStrategy" name="movexFindDeliveryCostStrategy" />
<bean id="movexFindDeliveryCostStrategy" class="com.namics.distrelec.erpabstraction.inout.erp.strategies.impl.DefaultMovexFindDeliveryCostStrategy" parent="defaultFindDeliveryCostStrategy" scope="tenant" />

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3906] LT: Login not working
item.description:
https://test.a.distrelec.lt/login
testing in OSX chrome and firefox

  • Log in with nando.mueller+lt1@gmail.com / distrelec
  • success message appears
  • click on any link (logo, category, ...)
    -> user is logged out again.
  • Same applies to when I use distrelec.testing+1@gmail.com / distrelec
item.summary: LT: Login not working

comments.comment: Apparently this is working fine from the Distrelec internal network, but not from outside or via Namics VPN

Problem was the Atos load balancer.
René has disabled node 2 on Atos, which has solved the problem. We are leaving node 2 down for the time being.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3896] MyAccount // Change login-data issue
item.description:
Steps:
1. change first & lastname.
2. check hmc -> Name should be changed.
3. logout & log back in to the webshop.
4. goto myAcc->LoginData //First-&Lastname is like on the initial registration.

user: distrelec.testing+lt.b2b@gmail.com
pw: 123456
item.summary: MyAccount // Change login-data issue

comments.comment:
From the backend point of view i've fixed the issue.
Unfortunately the updated contact details are not shown soon.
Probably there is a bug in the controller.

Anyway, now the informations are changed also in SAP.

To finally fix the issue we need to investigate a little bit more.

Francesco,

  • please add the fix version for the fix you did
  • what does it mean, "not shown soon"? Is it critical?

Hi Nando
i've added the missing informations.

I've checked again and the issue seems completely solved.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3783] Cart // export
item.description: The references in the cart on Product-Level are not written to the CSV-/XLS-File.

comments.comment:
Rafael,
Could you please add a screenshot?
Should we add the field also in the order history export?
Whats with the import tool?
Screenshot & Files attached.

• Please also add the field in the order-history export.
  • Customers use it to put notes on item basis.
  • The import-tool should of course also be able to import the previously exported notes/references.

Is this ok with you?

At which position should I add the reference in the export file?
Note that the current order is the following:

  • Distrelec Article Number
  • Manufacturer
  • Manufacturer
  • Article Number
  • Quantity
  • Name
  • Availability
  • Stock
  • Expired On
  • My Single Price
  • My Subtotal

item.description:
Add availability information to CartList of Order Review Page (ELFA_C131a)
as per spec listed in main ticket
item.summary: ELFA 130 OrderProcess: Add availability information to CartList of Order Review Page FE & BE

comments.comment: FE ok with fake values. I have to wait on some modifications of the cart to have the right values

As discussed with Rafael, the availability is display in green when the delivery time is less then 48h (availability.timeInMillisMaxGreen), in orange when the delivery time is less then 10 days (availability.timeInMillisMaxOrange) or in red.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3665] ELFA 130 OrderProcess: Adapt CoPOSAddressListRadio FE & BE
item.description:
ELFA 130 OrderProcess: Adapt CoPOSAddressListRadio FE
as per spec listed in main ticket
item.summary: ELFA 130 OrderProcess: Adapt CoPOSAddressListRadio FE & BE

comments.comment:
First part done but I have some questions. I have send an email to Dominik (see mail below).

I’m working on the DISTRELEC-3665 ticket and I have some questions. Raphael told me to ask it to you.
Is it possible to use html tag in the ligtbox (mod-lightbox-status)? I have try to use the code below but the display is without it:

On {0}, all of the products you are about to order will be available for pick-up at the selected location. <BR/>You have the following options:<BR/><UL><LI>Select a different pick-up location (or delivery method)</LI><LI>Wait for all your products to be available and pick them up at the date indicated above</LI><LI>Pick-up your items step-by-step according to their availabilty (continue to "Order Review" page for detailed availability information)</LI></UL>

There are 2 images (3a and 3b) visible on https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/ELFA_C167-CoPOSAddressListRadio). Are them already in hybris or should I create them? If yes, what is the src value?

Thank you,

Laurent

Hi Laurent

The mod-lightbox-status is used to display a status to a user. More info about it can be found here: https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/Howto+-+Status+Modal+Box Because its content has to be filled in dynamically, you can only add content using Javascript. For an example please see lightbox-status.js

Images: we use sprites for such small images because this is better for the performance. The two images that you mentioned above do already exist: s-success and s-warning. Have a look at cookie-notice.less to see how you can use them in your less/css.

-> Just call me if you need further assistance. Maybe we can discuss on the phone what your goal is and how you should do it. 044 533 27 28

Sprites task ok, thank you.
I have to wait on a cart modification to finish the javascrit modification.

I have always the lightbox problem, I will contact Dominic about this point.

Done but I was not really able to test it locally...
We should have a look with the next deployment.

comments.comment:
Hello,

Translations to do :

checkoutordersummarycostcenterbox.label : You can add an internal reference text/number to this order to help internal processes.<br>Distrelec will not use this reference.
checkoutordersummarycostcenterbox.costCenter : Your order reference (optional)

I think we should also change the title :

checkoutordersummarycostcenterbox.title : Cost Center and Project Number

After the morning build initialize, I will update the "order history part"

Order history not available for the moment.
Ticket for Lodestone : DISTRELEC-3828
Done. I have open a jira task for the properties translation (DISTRELEC-3847).

ProjectID vs. CostCenter
Now, the wrong field has been renamed... and the wrong field is hidden

Regarding: https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/E130+Order+Review+Page

  • Rename the field "Project ID" to the name "Your Reference" in all webshops, Movex shops included
  • cost center ID field not to be shown in elfa shops

Please update.
